body:
$spy Market will always surprise & fool the most people so,.... 
 
$aapl $amzn $baba $nflx

$AAPL $spy $qqq Well the Fed officially quashed the stock market.  Now will they continue to jaw bone to start a recession?  That would fix inflation!!  And to think a few weeks ago Papa Jay was adamant inflation was transitory and no tightening was required!  I have zero faith

$SPY if we went into a Bear mkt hitting 2100 covid lows would not unreasonable and arguably healthy. Wipe off froth and excess. 
Knock out reckless speculation. $DIA $QQQ $BTC.X $AAPL
$FUBO CEO on the Streets tommorow looking around in front of $AAPL or $AMZN HQ's for help...PLEASE BUY US!!
$AAPL when is ER ?

$AAPL was analyzed by 49 analysts. The buy consensus is at 84%. So analysts seem to be very confident about $AAPL. https://www.chartmill.com/stock/quote/AAPL/analyst-ratings?utm_source=stocktwits&utm_medium=ANALYST&utm_content=AAPL&utm_campaign=social_tracking
$AAPL will market crash next week ?
$AAPL weekly/monthly consolidation underway. Looks like neckline broke on daily h&s pattern.

Taking questions....go

$spy $qqq $aapl $pton
$AAPL i hate to say it: wide open gap still
@BDF24 @drEissa I'm shutting up man won't say a thing! I'll let $AAPL speak for me 🤣
$DKNG $SPY $OCGN $CLSK $AAPL 🚨 save, print and place on screen saver.  Mark it.  It’s going to 5000+

$aapl used to trade at 12x PE from 2011-2017
It’s gotten not only larger, but more expensive at 30x PE w like 2-4% revenue growth
Capital redistribution in form of dividend and share buy backs led it to 35x
